code: import React,{useEffect,useMemo,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{api}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Services=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[q,setQ]=useState('');const[cat,setCat]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{api.listServices().then(setItems).catch(()=>setItems([]));},[]);const filtered=useMemo(()=>items.filter(s=>{var _s$title,_s$description,_s$category;const matchQ=q?((_s$title=s.title)===null||_s$title===void 0?void 0:_s$title.toLowerCase().includes(q.toLowerCase()))||((_s$description=s.description)===null||_s$description===void 0?void 0:_s$description.toLowerCase().includes(q.toLowerCase())):true;const matchCat=cat?(_s$category=s.category)===null||_s$category===void 0?void 0:_s$category.toLowerCase().includes(cat.toLowerCase()):true;return matchQ&&matchCat;}),[items,q,cat]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:900,margin:'30px auto'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:8,margin:'12px 0'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Search",value:q,onChange:e=>setQ(e.target.value),className:"input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Category",value:cat,onChange:e=>setCat(e.target.value),className:"input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[filtered.map(s=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{padding:10,borderBottom:'1px solid #ddd'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/services/".concat(s.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:s.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:s.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Category: ",s.category," \u2014 Price: $",s.price]})]},s.id)),!filtered.length&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No services found."})]})]});};export default Services;
